TopicTitle: Anyway to "thrust limit" reaction wheels in MID-FLIGHT ?

Articles.Content:
Problem : Im using the CSS shuttle and during descent the atmosphere take a hold of the thing and whips it around due to this mod not being updated to the new aerodynamics.

Solution : To overpower the reaction wheel to 1000000000000 to force the shuttle to hold prograde using SMARTass.

However : I dont want that strong of the reaction wheel during the ascent and orbital manuevers. I want it reduced on the fly.

Is there a mod for that?

You might check out TweakableEverything but not sure on the ranges your talking about  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/58773-105-tweakableeverything-114-for-all-your-part-tweaking-needs/
